code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  numberOfArrays ( string  s ,  int  k )  {   vector < int >  mem ( s . length (),  -1 );   return  numberOfArrays ( s ,  0 ,  k ,  mem );   }   private :   static  constexpr  int  kMod  =  1'000'000'007 ;     int  numberOfArrays ( const  string &  s ,  int  i ,  int  k ,  vector < int >&  mem )  {   if  ( i  ==  s . length ())   return  1 ;    if  ( s [ i ]  ==  '0' )   return  0 ;    if  ( mem [ i ]  !=  -1 )   return  mem [ i ];   int  res  =  0 ;   long  num  =  0 ;   for  ( int  j  =  i ;  j  <  s . length ();  ++ j )  {   num  =  num  *  10  +  ( s [ j ]  -  '0' );   if  ( num  >  k )   break ;   res  =  ( res  +  numberOfArrays ( s ,  j  +  1 ,  k ,  mem ))  %  kMod ;   }   return  mem [ i ]  =  res ;   }  };
